original_text: He took Peter, James and John along with him, and he began to be deeply distressed and troubled.
korean_text: 베드로와 야고보와 요한을 데리고 가실새 심히 놀라시며 슬퍼하사

sentences.original_text: He took Peter, James and John along with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 베드로와 야고보와 요한을 데리고 갔다

sentences.original_text: and he began to be deeply distressed
